cab.content:
(THIS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY'S GOVERNMENT).
SECRET.
G.T.3776.
WAR CABINET.
SITUATION IN IRELAND.
Copy of telegram received in Irish Office from Dublin Castle, 1st March, 1918.
Please have following communicated immediately to Sir M. Hankey at War Cabinet :-
"Military and Police Authorities report definite evidences of improvement in Clare and other Counties and believe measures directed and in contemplation will secure desired results generally.
H.E.DUKE".
